alert.note: Alert for Gillespie; Kerr (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 8:40PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Kerr and southwestern Gillespie Counties through 930 PM CDT... At 840 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ingram, or 9 miles northwest of Kerrville, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kerrville, Ingram, Hunt, Cypress Creek, Mountain Home, Tivydale, Waltonia, Harper and Kerrville-Schreiner Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Texas.
